response:
The clinical picture of simultaneous or sequential optic neuritis and myelitis (dissemination in space) in a 43-year-old female is highly suggestive of an inflammatory demyelinating disorder. Distinguishing between MS and antibody-mediated diseases is crucial for long-term management.

differential_diagnosis = ["Multiple Sclerosis", "Neuromyelitis Optica Spectrum Disorder", "MOG Antibody Disease", "Neurosarcoidosis", "Systemic Lupus Erythematosus", "Acute Disseminated Encephalomyelitis"]
